comments: Goes out of her way to be difficult. Not helpful in clinical.

While she did not teach my section in lecture, I once had her for clinical. She was great. Very helpful and enthusiastic about our learning and what we were up to for the day. Was very approachable and made the clinical day less stressful.
tries to be your friend instead of your professor. would rather chat than lecture. she doesnt prepare you for the tests at all
Professor Goodrich is a newer nursing professor at WCSU and a very welcome one in my opinion. I have had her twice and she is one of the most approachable professors in the nursing department.
